title: NASA’s Next Chief, Jared Isaacman, Gives Answers in Senate Grilling
description: Jared Isaacman—the presumptive next leader of NASA—answered questions about his plans for the future of U.S. space exploration on Wednesday
content: On Wednesday U.S. senators told President Donald Trump’s pick to lead NASA that the agency must beat China back to the moon. The uncertain future of science at the embattled space agency, meanwhile, … [+6796 chars]
